about_the_game:
In the Flowerbots you boss around a team of adorable robots on the quest to turn a humble patch of land into a thriving and efficient garden. It is a unique incremental game with upgrades and synergies that make numbers go up while creating mesmerizing patterns of botanical beauty.

🌱 Automate growth. Delegate all the dirty work to flowerbots, sit back and watch your garden flourish.

🛠️ Master the synergies. Combine flowerbots and uncover synergies that will help you elevate your garden to the next level.

🎨 Grow in style. Nurture a garden that is not only efficient, but also a visually stunning piece of generative art.

☀️ Optimize and chill. Whether you want to dive into the rabbit hole of strategic optimization or to relax under the sun and watch flowerbots do their work, there’s a place for you in this garden.

If you enjoy optimizing a small physical simulation, theorizing about builds, and watching your plan unfold while numbers go up, we think that this game is for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 6850 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270 (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Flowerbots is a short incremental journey about upgrading the bots, uncovering their synergies, and nurturing an efficient garden.
